title: Streetlight Completely Out on Cedar Avenue Near Hospital
description: The streetlight on Cedar Avenue near City Hospital has been completely out for over a week. Pedestrians and night-time commuters are facing severe visibility issues, increasing the risk of accidents. The lamp post shows signs of water seepage and exposed wiring. Immediate electrical inspection and repair are crucial to prevent harm.

timeline.message: Citizen reported streetlight completely out for several nights; requests urgent repair.

title: Major Pothole on Maple Street Affecting Bus Traffic
description: A large and deep pothole has formed on Maple Street near the bus terminal, causing damage to vehicles and frequent traffic delays. Heavy rain has worsened the situation, filling the pothole with water and making it nearly invisible to drivers. Immediate patching is required to avoid accidents and ensure smooth traffic flow.

timeline.message: Citizen reported dangerous pothole causing vehicle damage; requests urgent patching.

title: Overflowing Sewer at Oak Street Causing Health Concerns
description: Sewage is overflowing from a manhole on Oak Street, spreading unpleasant odors and creating a severe health risk for residents, especially children playing nearby. The continuous overflow is affecting local businesses and sidewalks. Immediate cleaning, inspection, and possible pipe replacement are essential to maintain public safety.

timeline.message: Citizen reported sewer overflow causing health risk; urgent cleaning requested.

title: Overflowing Garbage Bin Near Main Bus Stop
description: The main garbage bin near the central bus stop is overflowing daily, causing waste to spread across the street and attracting insects. The accumulation poses hygiene hazards for commuters and nearby shops. A strict daily collection schedule and additional bins are recommended to manage waste properly.

timeline.message: Citizen reported overflowing garbage bin; requests regular collection enforcement.
Staff started working on the issue.
Staff marked this issue as resolved after completing necessary actions.

title: Broken Footpath Tiles Along Willow Street
description: Several tiles on the footpath of Willow Street are broken, creating trip hazards for pedestrians, particularly students and elderly residents. Poor lighting at night increases the risk of falls. Immediate footpath repair and proper lighting installation are advised to ensure safety.

timeline.message: Citizen reported broken footpath tiles; requests urgent repair for safety.

title: Water Leakage on Birch Avenue Affecting Sidewalks
description: A leaking main water pipe on Birch Avenue is causing continuous water accumulation on the sidewalks, damaging pavement and nearby gardens. Pedestrians are forced to walk on the road, increasing accident risk. Immediate inspection and pipe repair or replacement are essential.

timeline.message: Citizen reported water leakage causing road damage; urgent repair needed.

title: Damaged Traffic Signboard at Cedar & Pine Intersection
description: The traffic signboard at the intersection of Cedar and Pine streets is damaged and unreadable, causing confusion for drivers and minor traffic accidents. Temporary signage or replacement is urgently needed to prevent further incidents.

timeline.message: Citizen reported damaged traffic signboard; replacement requested.
Staff started replacement work for the traffic signboard.
Traffic signboard repaired and replaced by staff.

title: Collapsed Wooden Footbridge Over Community Stream
description: The small wooden footbridge over the community stream has collapsed, making it unsafe for children and residents to cross. Local schoolchildren are forced to take a longer and dangerous route. Urgent repair or replacement is necessary for public safety.

timeline.message: Citizen reported collapsed footbridge; urgent repair requested for safe passage.
Staff started repairing the footbridge.
Footbridge repaired and reopened for public use.

title: Vandalized Benches in Pinewood Community Park
description: Several benches in Pinewood Community Park have been vandalized, with broken planks and graffiti. Visitors, especially elderly people, are unable to use the seating areas safely. Repair or replacement of benches is needed to restore park safety and aesthetics.

timeline.message: Citizen reported vandalized benches; requests repair or replacement.

title: Fallen Tree Blocking Elm Avenue Near Shopping Mall
description: A large tree has fallen across Elm Avenue due to recent storms, completely blocking traffic. Nearby power lines are entangled in the branches, posing an electrocution risk. Emergency removal and road clearance are urgently required to restore traffic and public safety.
location: Elm Avenue, Near City Shopping Mall

timeline.message: Citizen reported fallen tree blocking road; urgent removal needed.
Staff started removing the fallen tree.
Tree cleared and road reopened.

title: Streetlight Not Functioning on Magnolia Street Near School
description: The streetlight on Magnolia Street near the community school has been out for several nights. Parents report difficulty seeing their children walking home, and drivers risk accidents due to poor visibility. The wiring appears damaged, and water has seeped into the lamp housing. Immediate repair is required to ensure pedestrian safety.

timeline.message: Citizen reported non-functional streetlight; urgent repair requested.
Staff started repairing the streetlight.
Streetlight repaired and functioning properly.

title: Enormous Pothole on Cherry Boulevard Causing Traffic Hazards
description: Cherry Boulevard has developed a massive pothole near the central market. Vehicles frequently hit the pothole, resulting in tire and suspension damage. Heavy rains fill the pothole with water, making it almost invisible. Immediate repair and proper road resurfacing are necessary to prevent accidents.

timeline.message: Citizen reported large pothole causing vehicle damage; urgent repair required.
